    • de.leipzig.htwk.faroo.api.Api

extends java.lang.Object
    Die Klasse Api stellt die query Methoden bereit und kommuniziert mit der Faroo Suchmaschine Ã¼ber eine API Schnittstelle.

      • query

        public Results query(java.lang.String query,
                     int start,
                     int length,
                     java.lang.String language,
                     java.lang.String src)
              throws APIExecption
        Anfrage an die Faroo API stellen url wird zusammen gestzt
        Parameters:
        query - Suchwort
        start - Bei welchem Suchergebnis soll die Suche anfangen
        length - Anzahl an Ergebnisse (max. 10 - default 10)
        language - Englisch = en, Deutsch = ge, Chinesisch = zh
        src - Source web Web Search (default) Sorted by relevancy Contains all kinds of results news News Search Sorted by publishing date Contains only news articles from newspapers, magazines and blogs topics Trending Topics Similar to Trending News: Trending News: for each topic a main article with all properties + related articles with title, url, domain only. Trending Topics: for each topic all the related articles are provided with all properties (more data, slower transfer). trends Trending Terms Trending terms, sorted by buzz (number of sources reporting on same term). suggest Suggestions Suggestions include auto completes for query substrings and corrections for misspelled terms. When using the above searches with parameter i=true, the suggesti- ons are already included in the search result.
        Returns:
        Results Liste
        Throws:
        APIExecption - Wert kleiner 1.

      • query

        public Results query(java.lang.String query,
                     int start,
                     int length,
                     java.lang.String language,
                     java.lang.String src,
                     java.lang.String kwic)
              throws APIExecption
        Anfrage an die Faroo API stellen url wird zusammen gestzt
        Parameters:
        query - Suchwort
        start - Bei welchem Suchergebnis soll die Suche anfangen
        length - Anzahl an Ergebnisse (max. 10 - default 10)
        language - Englisch = en, Deutsch = ge, Chinesisch = zh
        src - Source web Web Search (default) Sorted by relevancy Contains all kinds of results news News Search Sorted by publishing date Contains only news articles from newspapers, magazines and blogs topics Trending Topics Similar to Trending News: Trending News: for each topic a main article with all properties + related articles with title, url, domain only. Trending Topics: for each topic all the related articles are provided with all properties (more data, slower transfer). trends Trending Terms Trending terms, sorted by buzz (number of sources reporting on same term). suggest Suggestions Suggestions include auto completes for query substrings and corrections for misspelled terms. When using the above searches with parameter i=true, the suggesti- ons are already included in the search result.
        kwic - Keyword in context false snippet is selected from the begin- ning of the article. true (default) snippet is selected from the article parts con- taining the keywords.
        Returns:
        Results Liste
        Throws:
        APIExecption - Wert kleiner 1.

      • query

        public Results query(java.lang.String query,
                     int start,
                     int length,
                     java.lang.String language,
                     java.lang.String src,
                     java.lang.String kwic,
                     boolean i)
              throws APIExecption
        Anfrage an die Faroo API stellen url wird zusammen gestzt
        Parameters:
        query - Suchwort
        start - Bei welchem Suchergebnis soll die Suche anfangen
        length - Anzahl an Ergebnisse (max. 10 - default 10)
        language - Englisch = en, Deutsch = ge, Chinesisch = zh
        src - Source web Web Search (default) Sorted by relevancy Contains all kinds of results news News Search Sorted by publishing date Contains only news articles from newspapers, magazines and blogs topics Trending Topics Similar to Trending News: Trending News: for each topic a main article with all properties + related articles with title, url, domain only. Trending Topics: for each topic all the related articles are provided with all properties (more data, slower transfer). trends Trending Terms Trending terms, sorted by buzz (number of sources reporting on same term). suggest Suggestions Suggestions include auto completes for query substrings and corrections for misspelled terms. When using the above searches with parameter i=true, the suggesti- ons are already included in the search result.
        kwic - Keyword in context false snippet is selected from the begin- ning of the article. true (default) snippet is selected from the article parts con- taining the keywords.
        i - Instant search false (default) searches for query q true searches for best suggestion if query q is substring or misspelled. Slower search!
        Returns:
        Results Liste
        Throws:
        APIExecption - Wert zu klein

        public Results query(java.lang.String query,

              throws APIExecption

        Parameters:
        query - Suchwort
        start - Bei welchem Suchergebnis soll die Suche anfange
        language - Englisch = en, Deutsch = ge, Chinesisch = zh
        src - Source web Web Search (default) Sorted by relevancy Contains all kinds of results news News Search Sorted by publishing date Contains only news articles from newspapers, magazines and blogs topics Trending Topics Similar to Trending News: Trending News: for each topic a main article with all properties + related articles with title, url, domain only. Trending Topics: for each topic all the related articles are provided with all properties (more data, slower transfer). trends Trending Terms Trending terms, sorted by buzz (number of sources reporting on same term). suggest Suggestions Suggestions include auto completes for query substrings and corrections for misspelled terms. When using the above searches with parameter i=true, the suggesti- ons are already included in the search result.
        kwic - Keyword in context false snippet is selected from the begin- ning of the article. true (default) snippet is selected from the article parts con- taining the keywords.
        i - Instant search false (default) searches for query q true searches for best suggestion if query q is substring or misspelled. Slower search!
        Returns:
        Results Liste

        public Results query(java.lang.String query,
                     java.lang.String language,
                     java.lang.String src,
                     java.lang.String kwic,
                     boolean i)
              throws APIExecption
        Anfrage an die Faroo API stellen url wird zusammen gestzt
        Parameters:
        query - Suchwort
        language - Englisch = en, Deutsch = ge, Chinesisch = zh
        src - Source web Web Search (default) Sorted by relevancy Contains all kinds of results news News Search Sorted by publishing date Contains only news articles from newspapers, magazines and blogs topics Trending Topics Similar to Trending News: Trending News: for each topic a main article with all properties + related articles with title, url, domain only. Trending Topics: for each topic all the related articles are provided with all properties (more data, slower transfer). trends Trending Terms Trending terms, sorted by buzz (number of sources reporting on same term). suggest Suggestions Suggestions include auto completes for query substrings and corrections for misspelled terms. When using the above searches with parameter i=true, the suggesti- ons are already included in the search result.
        kwic - Keyword in context false snippet is selected from the begin- ning of the article. true (default) snippet is selected from the article parts con- taining the keywords.
        i - Instant search false (default) searches for query q true searches for best suggestion if query q is substring or misspelled. Slower search!
        Returns:
        Results Liste
        Throws:
